CustomField.defaultValue: "International digital bundles are available for digital lodgement only. International Airmail Letters component of this bundle must be lodged over the counter using BML/eLMS. Have you investigated if your customer is lodging letters? Are they using the non digital bundle? If not, consider removing this from their contract. If Domestic customer = No, Revenue commitment cannot be less than $3000 to qualify for an International Contract."
CustomField.description: created for International Digital PCMS Bundle Inc Airmail letters
CustomField.label: Help Text
